EmailTemplate.description: DuPont™ Kevlar® Laundry Guide for Cut Resistant Apparel
EmailTemplate.name: DPS- DuPont™ Kevlar® Laundry Guide for Cut Resistant Apparel
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® Laundry Guide for Cut Resistant Apparel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar®.
Below is the the web address to a Kevlar® Laundry Guide for Cut Resistant Apparel. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/Personal_Protection/en_US/assets/downloads/kevlar/K17038Kevlar.pdf
This guide discusses the cleaning of cut resistant apparel made with DuPont™ Kevlar® brand fiber using standard industrial cleaning practices, including the impact of cleaning on performance. This information is applicable to other types of apparel manufactured with Kevlar® fiber. Before initiating a cleaning program, consult the protective apparel supplier regarding any special cleaning requirements for the products under consideration.
Please continue to visit out DuPont websites which provides additional information about Nomex® or Kevlar® as well as other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions
